title: What Actually Moves Currency Exchange Rates? Testing 7 Theories
excerpt: Interest rate differentials, purchasing power parity, trade balancesâ€”everyone has theories about what drives currency movements. But what does the data actually show? We test seven major theories against real exchange rate data for EUR/USD, USD/JPY, and GBP/USD using regression analysis and visualizations. The results reveal which factors actually matter and which are just noise.
